name: Inch Event-Only Exclusive
additionalNotes: https://halfwheel.com/e-p-carrillo-releasing-two-new-event-only-packs/416964/:  A "Nicaraguan-grown wrapper from the country’s Jalapa region, while the binder and filler are a combination of the Inch Nicaragua and the two Dominican-made Inch lines, though the company isn’t disclosing the specific components being used."
